liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing fyDai with some of the Dai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(poolProxy)` or with `addLiquidityWithSignature`. Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(daiUsed)` or with `addLiquidityWithSignature`. Caller must have called `addLiquidityWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.","params":{"daiUsed":"amount of Dai to use to mint liquidity. If `return[2]` is `false`, `addLiquidityWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `addLiquidity` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures."},"addLiquidityWithSignature(address,uint256,uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Mints liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing fyDai with some of the Dai. ","maxFYDai":"maximum amount of fyDai to be borrowed to mint liquidity."},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of liquidity tokens minted.  "}},"removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Burns tokens and repays debt with proceedings. Sells any excess fyDai for Dai, then returns all Dai, and if there is no debt in the Controller, all posted Chai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(poolProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(poolProxy)` or with `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` Caller must have called `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.","params":{"minimumFYDaiPrice":"minimum Dai/fyDai price to be accepted when internally selling fyDai.","poolTokens":"amount of pool tokens to burn. If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. documentation.text: @dev Return to caller all posted chai if there is no debt, converted to dai, plus any dai remaining in the contract.

@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `addLiquidity`.
 If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `addLiquidityWithSignature` will set the proxy approvals.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `addLiquidityWithSignature` must be called with a dai permit signature.
 If `return[2]` is `false`, `addLiquidityWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `addLiquidity` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
@dev Set proxy approvals for `addLiquidity` with a given pool.

@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool`.
 If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` will set the proxy approvals.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
@dev Set proxy approvals for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool` with a given pool.

@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed`.
 If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` will set the proxy approvals.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
@dev Set proxy approvals for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed` with a given pool.

@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `removeLiquidityMature`.
 If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `removeLiquidityMatureCheck` will set the proxy approvals.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityMatureCheck` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityMatureCheck` must be called with a pool signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `removeLiquidityMature` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
@dev Set proxy approvals for `removeLiquidityMature`.
@dev Return to caller all posted chai if there is no debt, converted to dai, plus any dai remaining in the contract.

@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `addLiquidity`.
 If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `addLiquidityWithSignature` will set the proxy approvals.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `addLiquidityWithSignature` must be called with a dai permit signature.
 If `return[2]` is `false`, `addLiquidityWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `addLiquidity` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
@dev Set proxy approvals for `addLiquidity` with a given pool.

@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool`.
 If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` will set the proxy approvals.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
@dev Set proxy approvals for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool` with a given pool.

 If `return[1]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

addLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256).details: Mints liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing fyDai with some of the Dai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(poolProxy)` or with `addLiquidityWithSignature`. Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(daiUsed)` or with `addLiquidityWithSignature`. Caller must have called `addLiquidityWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.

params.daiUsed: amount of Dai to use to mint liquidity.
params.maxFYDai: maximum amount of fyDai to be borrowed to mint liquidity.

returns._0: The amount of liquidity tokens minted.

addLiquidityApprove(address).details: Set proxy approvals for `addLiquidity` with a given pool.

addLiquidityCheck(address).details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `addLiquidity`. If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `addLiquidityWithSignature` will set the proxy approvals. If `return[1]` is `false`, `addLiquidityWithSignature` must be called with a dai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `addLiquidityWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `addLiquidity` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

addLiquidityWithSignature(address,uint25.details: Mints liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing fyDai with some of the Dai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(poolProxy)` Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(daiUsed)`

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.daiSig: packed signature for permit of dai transfers to this proxy. Ignored if '0x'.
params.daiUsed: amount of Dai to use to mint liquidity.
params.maxFYDai: maximum amount of fyDai to be borrowed to mint liquidity.

returns._0: The amount of liquidity tokens minted.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed(address,uin.details: Burns tokens and repays debt with proceedings. Sells any excess fyDai for Dai, then returns all Dai, and if there is no debt in the Controller, all posted Chai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(poolProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(poolProxy)` or with `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` Caller must have called `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.

params.minimumFYDaiPrice: minimum Dai/fyDai price to be accepted when internally selling fyDai.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedApprove(addr.details: Set proxy approvals for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed` with a given pool.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedCheck(addres.details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed`. If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` will set the proxy approvals. If `return[1]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignatur.details: Burns tokens and repays debt with proceedings. Sells any excess fyDai for Dai, then returns all Dai, and all unlocked Chai.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.minimumFYDaiPrice: minimum Dai/fyDai price to be accepted when internally selling fyDai.
params.poolSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool(address,uint.details: Burns tokens and sells Dai proceedings for fyDai. Pays as much debt as possible, then sells back any remaining fyDai for Dai. Then returns all Dai, and if there is no debt in the Controller, all posted Chai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(poolProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(poolProxy)` or with `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` Caller must have called `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.

params.minimumDaiPrice: minimum fyDai/Dai price to be accepted when internally selling Dai.
params.minimumFYDaiPrice: minimum Dai/fyDai price to be accepted when internally selling fyDai.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolApprove(addre.details: Set proxy approvals for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool` with a given pool.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolCheck(address.details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool`. If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` will set the proxy approvals. If `return[1]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPoolWithSignature.details: Burns tokens and sells Dai proceedings for fyDai. Pays as much debt as possible, then sells back any remaining fyDai for Dai. Then returns all Dai, and all unlocked Chai.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.minimumDaiPrice: minimum fyDai/Dai price to be accepted when internally selling Dai.
params.minimumFYDaiPrice: minimum Dai/fyDai price to be accepted when internally selling fyDai.
params.poolSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityMature(address,uint256).details: Burns tokens and repays fyDai debt after Maturity.  Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(poolProxy)` or `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` Caller must have called `removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixedWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.

params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityMatureCheck(address).details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `removeLiquidityMature`. If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `removeLiquidityMatureCheck` will set the proxy approvals. If `return[1]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityMatureCheck` must be called with a controller signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `removeLiquidityMatureCheck` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `removeLiquidityMature` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

removeLiquidityMatureWithSignature(addre.details: Burns tokens and repays fyDai debt after Maturity.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.poolSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.
